item.title: Lambda Days 2016
item.description: Lambda Days 2016 - Kraków This last two days I’ve spend on a conference in Kraków. The topics revolved around functional programming, with all the experimental stuff, popular languages, etc. Here are the talks I’ve been to and short summaries of those: Day 1: Propositions as types - the keynote delivered by Philip Wadler - seen it already on YouTube. But the thing with Lambda t-shirt looked funny again :D
